bug.author: nmanovic
bug.summary: Tooltip should be hidden after mouse is out of an element
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
Read/searched the docs Searched past issues
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behaviour</denchmark-h>
A tooltip should be hidden after mouse is out of an element which generates the tooltip. <denchmark-h:h3>Current Behaviour</denchmark-h>
Even I move the mouse cursor out of an element, the tooltip is still visible. It is really annoying problem which doesn't allow in come cases modify/press other UI elements. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40690625/86177772-db942e80-bb2f-11ea-8bd8-198432f07909.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Context</denchmark-h>
I have the problem each time when I try to demonstrate CVAT to internal/external customers. It is a really critical usability issue. <denchmark-h:h3>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
